block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 15 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It is the Tri Plane designed by Nick Robinson. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 014 : Space Wing by Stephen Weiss", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/VhqDaGH9XhE Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to connect using origami. If you like origami and if you like paper airplanes, please remember to subscribe. I will be delivering something new to you every week. Use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Thanks for watching.
